picks.text: AirPods to gain more controls via touch actions
picks.full-pick-text: AirPods to gain more controls via touch actions

picks.text: At least 1 more color option comes to AirPods
picks.full-pick-text: At least 1 more color option comes to AirPods

picks.text: The AirPods line is split in two, and the lower end version gets a price drop
picks.full-pick-text: The AirPods line is split in two, and the lower end version gets a price drop
picks.notes:
• The additional condition is an intentionally risky choice by Federico
  • Ultimately this is in fact his undoing. While AirPods Pro were released to split the line, the normal AirPods 2 didn't drop from their original $159 price until the 3rd generation was released in October 2021.

picks.text: The next HomePod is a mini HomePod
picks.full-pick-text: The next HomePod is a mini HomePod
picks.notes: • True, but too late. The HomePod mini wasn't released until 2020.
• In April, they were cut from $349 to $299.

picks.text: Shortcuts will gain new HomePod/AirPlay 2 actions to play audio on HomePod more quickly
picks.full-pick-text: Shortcuts will gain new HomePod/AirPlay 2 actions to play audio on HomePod more quickly

picks.text: Apple will create some new noise-cancelling technology
picks.full-pick-text: Apple will create some new noise-cancelling technology
picks.notes:
• Some sort of thing that they put into an AirPod or something that they tout as invented by Apple, is how it was clarified during predictions.
  • Myke, in absentia, gets the benefit of the doubt as to how new the AirPods Pro tech is.

picks.text: Better incorporation of Apple News into the audio ecosystem
picks.full-pick-text: Better incorporation of Apple News into the audio ecosystem
picks.notes:
• For example, asking Siri for the news on a HomePod
  • This did eventually happen, but in 2020.

picks.text: HeadPods will be wireless only and they will have no headphone jack and will charge via Lightning or USB-C
picks.full-pick-text: HeadPods will be wireless only and they will have no headphone jack and will charge via Lightning or USB-C
